documents.document: To do two things at once is to do neither. Publilius Syrus
A foolish man despises his mother.AmericanProverb
What a fearful object a long-neglected duty gets to be -Chauncey Wright -American philosopher and mathematician
It is much more difficult to measure non performance than performance. Harold S Geneen
#quotes Because I'm thinking in a broader way, I feel like I am able to make better decisions.
#quotes Today, a skilled manager makes more than the owner. And owners fight each other to get the skilled managers.
You can't operate a company by fear, because the way to eliminate fear is to avoid criticism. And the way to avoid criticism is to do nothin
Great spirits have always encountered violent opposition from mediocre minds. Albert Einstein
A successful man continues to look for work after he has found a job. Anonymous
Poor iron won't make a sharp sword. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Humility about how little I know has encouraged me to listen more carefully and more wisely.
An open gate lets stock out.AmericanProverb
There is nothing so useless as doing efficiently that which should not be done at all. Peter Drucker
#quotes We are not animals. We are not a product of what has happened to us in our past. We have the power of choice.
#quotes I am always doing things I can't do, that's how I get to do them.
The only reason for time is so that everything doesn't happen at once. Albert Einstein
The great thing in the world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving. Oliver Wendell Holmes
Constant dripping wears away stone. AmericanProverb
If at first you don't succeed, you are running about average. M. H. Alderson
I don't like that man. I must get to know him better. Abe Lincoln
#quotes There's no genius behind it. It's persistence and listening to people.
Sometimes a noble failure serves the world as faithfully as a distinguished success. Dowden
A big fish is caught with big bait. African Congo Proverb
The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart. Robert Green Ingersoll
#quotes We're all working together; that's the secret.
Before you build a better mousetrap, it helps to know if there are any mice out there. Mortimer B. Zuckerman
#quotes The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
Common sense is very uncommon with a lot of people. AmericanProverb
Everyone should be respected as an individual, but no one idolized Albert Einstein
#quotes You don't have to be the biggest to beat the biggest.
It is better to err on the side of daring than the side of caution. Alvin Toffler
45 The business schools reward difficult complex behavior more than simple behavior, but simple behavior is more effective. Warren Buffett
A wound will heal. Talk won't. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Failure is a word I don't accept.
#quotes The winner is the chef who takes the same ingredients as everyone else and produces the best results.
#quotes Management is nothing more than motivating other people.
The greatest inspiration is often born of desperation. Comer Cotrell
Do one thing everyday that scares you. Eleanor Roosevelt
#quotes Sandwich every bit of criticism between two thick layers of praise.
Cheerfulness, helpfulness and honesty are fine, good companions to take with you through life. AmericanProverb
It usually takes me more than three weeks to prepare a good impromptu speech. Mark Twain
#quotes You've got to love what you do to really make things happen.
Action is the proper fruit of knowledge.AmericanProverb
I like to think that the moon is there even if I am not looking at it Albert Einstein
Our work is the presentation of our capabilities. Edward Gibbon
#quotes Our success is a direct result of knowing how to market a brand and having the right people representing the brand.
Bad planning on your part does not constitute an emergency on my part. AmericanProverb
#quotes Self-praise is for losers. Be a winner. Stand for something. Always have class, and be humble.
The buck stops with the guy who signs the checks. Rupert Murdoch
You have to do your own growing no matter how tall your grandfather was. Abe Lincoln
Money was never a big motivation for me, except as a way to keep score. The real excitement is playing the game. Donald Trump
#quotes Whole Foods is dedicated to helping people be healthier and live lives with more vitality and greater sense of well being.
#quotes Many a small thing has been made large by the right kind of advertising.
A man's dreams are his own.AmericanProverb
He who lives by the crystal ball soon learns to eat ground glass. Edgar R. Fiedler
It is a miracle that curiosity survives formal education. Albert Einstein
Success is not to be pursued; it is to be attracted by the person we become. Jim Rohn
The person who is cornered will fight. Afghan Proverb
#quotes Sometimes, we just don't know enough about what we are trying to achieve.
The first responsibility of a leader is to define reality. The last is to say thank you. In between, the leader is a servant. Max de Pree
Business today consists in persuading crowds. T. S. Eliot
Portuguese Proverb
Policies are many, Principles are few, Policies will change, Principles never do. John C Maxwell
#quotes Never measure the height of a mountain, until you have reached the top. Then you will see how low it was.
#quotes Decide what you want, decide what you are willing to exchange for it. Establish your priorities and go to work.
"Nobody who ever gave his best regretted it." - George Halas
#quotes I just lucked into things. I used to think that if I made $50,000 I'd be the happiest guy in the world.
#quotes To understand the heart and mind of a person, look not at what he has already achieved, but at what he aspires to.
Most of what we call management consists of making it difficult for people to get their work done. Peter Drucker
Big jobs usually go to the men who prove their ability to outgrow small ones. Ralph Waldo Emerson
#quotes I've always believed that it's important to show a new look periodically. Predictability can lead to failure.
The most important persuasion tool you have in your entire arsenal is integrity. Zig Ziglar
Dig the well before you are thirsty. AmericanProverb
It is impossible to win the race unless you venture to run, impossible to win the victory unless you dare to battle. Richard DeVos
Courage without conduct is like a ship without ballast. AmericanProverb
#quotes Public sentiment is everything. With public sentiment, nothing can fail. Without it, nothing can succeed.
Restless feet may walk into a snake pit. Ethiopian Proverb
Admiration is the daughter of ignorance.AmericanProverb
If the master gnaws bones, what will he give the dog? Afghan Proverb
By the yard, life is hard. By the inch, it's a cinch. AmericanProverb
Unknown Author The sign on the door of opportunity reads PUSH.
Hard work spotlights the character of people: some turn up their sleeves, some turn up their noses, and some don't turn up at all. Sam Ewig
#quotes Turks have a dismissive phrase: he works like a clerk. I have turned this insult around: I am proud to say that I work like a clerk.
#quotes Executives owe it to the organization and to their fellow workers not to tolerate nonperforming individuals in important jobs.
#quotes I mean, there's no arguing. There is no anything. There is no beating around the bush. "You're fired" is a very strong term.
Your philosophy determines whether you will go for the disciplines or continue the errors. JIM ROHN
#quotes The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
If at first you don't succeed, you are running about average. M. H. Alderson
A picture is worth a thousand words.AmericanProverb
Never mistake knowledge for wisdom. One helps you make a living; the other helps you make a life. Sandara Carey
U can close more bus. n 2 months by becoming interested n other people than U can in 2 yrs by trying 2 get people interested in U. Carnegie
#quotes You don't need to have a 100-person company to develop that idea.
Either you run the day or the day runs you. JIM ROHN
#quotes Even when you think you have your life all mapped out, things happen that shape your destiny in ways you might never have imagined.
I've always believed that you can think positive just as well as you can think negative. Sugar Ray Robinson
#quotes I'm tired of dreaming. I'm into doing at the moment. It's, like, let's only have goals that we can go after.
#quotes There is no class so pitiably wretched as that which possesses money and nothing else.
The new information technology... Internet and e-mail... have practically eliminated the physical costs of communications. Peter Drucker
#quotes The only limit to your impact is your imagination and commitment.
#quotes Regardless of how well a studio is run, it's only as good as the product it produces.
